attributes.action: Save St. John’s primary school walworth
attributes.additional_details: Help us the community and our St. John’s walworth primary school stay open and educate our children and protect our children from entering a different level of education elsewhere and also the teachers jobs and our fantastic head teacher
attributes.background: Our St. John’s primary school walworth has been around generations and our children have to currently look for a new primary school as it sadly closing at the end of July due to financial difficulties

rejection.details: This is a matter for Southwark Council not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a petition to Southwark Council calling on them to reconsider this decision, if that is something you'd like to happen. You can find out more about how to do this here: https://www.southwark.gov.uk/engagement-and-consultations/have-your-say/petition-scheme.
